name: Sleepee
description:
The player controls a sleepy girl. She needs to reach the bathroom after waking up in the middle of the night. On her path she will avoid the obstacles and fight against drowsiness.

Controls (requires gamepad):

  • Steer with left analog stick
  • Brake and open your eyes by pressing and holding both triggers simultaneously
  • Release the triggers to sprint

Developed for Global Game Jam 2019 - Theme: What home means to you.

Original page: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/sleepee
